title: Ep. 484 - Don't Listen To The Media. Andrew Cuomo Has Done A Terrible Job.
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, a lot to discuss. First, we’ll talk about the media’s love affair with Andrew Cuomo. He’s being painted as the hero of the pandemic, but the reality is closer to the opposite. Also, some girls are suing to prevent boys from competing in girl’s sports. But the judge has instructed their lawyers that biological boys must be referred to as “female” in his courtroom. We’ll discuss that insanity. And in our Daily Cancellation, I’ll cancel a NYT writer who thinks mothers should be getting paid to be mothers.

If you like The Matt Walsh Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: WALSH and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/Walsh
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
